description:
+ [Added] Blogs module added with SEO
+ [Added] Time slot enable/disable option with date hide/show control
+ [Added] On/Off setting for doorstep delivery
+ [Added] Product request option from customer side
+ [Added] Free delivery time slot option
+ [Fix] Product detail page improvement in website
+ [Fix] Order and self-pickup list pagination in admin panel
+ [Fix] Deep link issue fixed
+ [Improvements] Product bulk upload system and process
+ [Improvements] Seller forgot password flow in app
+ [Improvements] Delivery boy forgot password flow in app
